name: Framing Hammer
body:
##About##

Framing Hammer was inspired by the WireFrame Tool found at [http://www.grokfusebox.com/index.cfm?ref=showGoodies](http://www.grokfusebox.com/index.cfm?ref=showGoodies)

The Framing Hammer allows you to quickly develop the flow of a layout by collecting three pieces of information for each page: page title, description, and exit points.

Pages are saved in the local browser using HTML5's localStorage feature.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: HTML5 based Wire Frame development app.
